name: Pinnacle
long_description:
Pinnacle is Klaviyo for RCS, the new standard for SMS that embeds apps. Our no-code tool lets brands send RCS messages to consumers to shop directly in their SMS. 

If you or someone you know in e-commerce or at a marketing agency for e-commerce wants to increase sales with the next era of SMS marketing, reach out to us for a demo!

- Email founders@trypinnacle.app OR
- Text (870) 897 7103 OR
- Book a 15 minute meeting: https://calendly.com/founders-at-pinnacle/discovery
